name: n8n
description: n8n is a workflow automation platform and alternative to Zapier, enabling self-hosted automations with node-based editing. It offers integrations, triggers, custom code, and an extensible runtime.
features: Visual workflow editor: Drag-and-drop interface for building automation workflows without code, connecting nodes to create complex logic flows.
400+ integrations: Pre-built connectors for popular services including databases, APIs, cloud platforms, and productivity tools.
Custom code execution: Run JavaScript or Python within workflows to handle complex transformations and business logic.
Webhook triggers: Start workflows via HTTP requests, enabling real-time automation from external systems.
Scheduled execution: Run workflows on cron schedules or intervals for recurring tasks and batch processing.
Error handling: Built-in retry logic, error workflows, and debugging tools to ensure reliable automation.
Self-hosted control: Full data ownership with on-premise deployment, ensuring privacy and compliance.
Version control: Track workflow changes, rollback to previous versions, and collaborate with team members.
Credential management: Securely store API keys and authentication tokens with encryption.
Execution history: View logs and outputs from past workflow runs for debugging and auditing.
Community nodes: Extend functionality with community-built integrations and custom node packages.
API access: Programmatically manage workflows and executions via REST API for advanced automation.
